key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to operating in a highly regulated industry
Data breach and cybersecurity concerns following a significant breach in June 2024
Economic sensitivity tied to U.S. small and mid-sized business sectors
Integration risks from the $2.3 billion acquisition of Marcum LLP
controversies: Class action investigation due to the June 2024 data breach
Regulatory issues associated with Marcum LLP prior to acquisition
social_issues: Potential reputational damage from the data breach and class action investigation
governance_issues: Leadership transition with the appointment of a new CFO in December 2024
Increased leverage post-Marcum acquisition, potentially impacting financial stability
